title: One Second
description: EXPLOSIVE FINAL INSTALLMENT IN THE SEVEN SERIESLove. Family. Brotherhood. Lexi has faced personal struggles, but nothing has prepared her for the most perilous battle of her life. Shifters are on the brink of war as Northerners target Colorado in an attempt to infiltrate the borders. Texas winds up on the hit list, and the Weston pack prepares to fight for their land… and for their lives. Austin’s courage is put to the test when rogues want to seize his land and slaughter his pack. But that’s not all he’s facing as two shocking revelations turn their lives upside down. His love for Lexi is unwavering, but their future is uncertain. Will the local packs set aside their differences to fight together, or will this be the end of peace among Shifters? Stand witness to the epic conclusion of the Seven series.Destiny will find you.Release date: April 5, 2016––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––-Let me email you when it’s live: http://eepurl.com/UtV35
author: Dannika Dark
